item.title: Java Code Examples for org.apache.commons.text.StringEscapeUtils.unescapeCsv()
item.description: Java Code Example 1 import org.apache.commons.text.StringEscapeUtils; public class StringEscapeUtilsUnescapeCsvExample1 { public static void main(String[] args) { String inputString = "\"1,23\""; String outputString = StringEscapeUtils.unescapeCsv(inputString); System.out.println("Input String: " + inputString); System.out.println("Output String: " + outputString); } } Output: Input String: "1,23" Output String: 1,23 Java Code Example 2 import org.apache.commons.text.StringEscapeUtils; public class StringEscapeUtilsUnescapeCsvExample2 { public static void main(String[] args) { String inputString = "\"sample \n text\""; String outputString = StringEscapeUtils.

item.title: Java Code Examples for org.apache.commons.text.StringEscapeUtils.escapeCsv()
item.description: Java Code Example 1 import org.apache.commons.text.StringEscapeUtils; public class StringEscapeUtilsEscapeCsvExample1 { public static void main(String[] args) { String inputString = "1,23"; String outputString = StringEscapeUtils.escapeCsv(inputString); System.out.println("Input String: " + inputString); System.out.println("Output String: " + outputString); } } Output: Input String: 1,23 Output String: "1,23" Java Code Example 2 import org.apache.commons.text.StringEscapeUtils; public class StringEscapeUtilsEscapeCsvExample2 { public static void main(String[] args) { String inputString = "sample \n text"; String outputString = StringEscapeUtils.
